relationships.name: concept
relationships.joinClause: inner join observation on person.person_id = observation.person_id inner join concept on observation.observation_concept_id = concept.concept_id

relationships.name: vocabulary
relationships.joinClause: inner join observation on person.person_id = observation.person_id inner join concept on observation.observation_concept_id = concept.concept_id inner join vocabulary on concept.vocabulary_id = vocabulary.vocabulary_id

relationships.name: observation
relationships.joinClause: innner join observation on person.person_id = observation.person_id
